member.name: M:Tzoker.Results.Controllers.Super3Controller.GetSummary(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the summary of the draw, including the winning numbers.
member.param: The drawId as it appears on the ticket, eg: 1351
member.returns: JSON with the summary of the draw

member.name: M:Tzoker.Results.Controllers.Super3Controller.GetDetails(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns detailed draw results for the given draw.
member.param: The drawId as it appears on the ticket, eg: 1351
